name: A crumpled silver wand, covered in runes
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wand can be used to 'inflict' curses on enemies. It currently contains:
